task.instruction: You are Susan Lee (susan.lee@company.com) and you would like to create a new page in the Engineering space. This page should be created if page 131 and any child page of page 20 are in markdown format. The newly created page should have its title taken from page 131 but its content and content format should be from the child page of page 20. You would like to add page 28 to 'reference' label and delete page 14.

output.name: Engineering
output.description: Central hub for engineering documentation, technical specifications, system architecture, and development processes for the engineering team.
